summary: Comedian Bonnie McFarlane dons her investigative journalist's hat to find out once and for all if women are funny and report her unbiased findings in what some are calling the most important documentary of our generation.
cast: Maria Bamford|Adam Carolla|Anthony Cumia|Susie Essman|Marina Franklin|Todd Glass|Judy Gold|Gregg Hughes|Adrienne Iapalucci|Lisa Lampanelli|Artie Lange|Bonnie McFarlane|Jim Norton|Chelsea Peretti|Joan Rivers|Rita Rudner|Amy Schumer|Sarah Silverman|Wanda Sykes|Rich Vos
title: Women Aren't Funny
